name: Purgatory is a Music Store
description:
Regret is a loop that is difficult to break out of. As an angel, it's your job to help lost souls break free.

Bond through a love of music :) AND BLAST THAT TRUMPET UNTIL YOU FEEL BETTER!

Controls:

wasd - move
esc - quit
f - toggle fullscreen
0-9 - play music
spacebar - progress dialogue

Credits:

Art - Rebecca Harrison
Audio - Julian Beutel
Writing - Daniel Voth
Programming - Matt Woelk

Ludum Dare voting link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/purgatory-is-a-music-store

updates:
v1.2 - modifier keys are no longer "any key", so alt-tabbing won't skip things
